metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1051 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: It was found that the fix for CVE-2016-9606 in versions 3.0.22 and 3.1.2 was incomplete and Yaml unmarshalling in Resteasy is still possible via `Yaml.load()` in YamlProvider.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Incomplete fix for CVE-2016-9606 not applied. That fix just disables the YamlProvider by default. There is no fix for this issue other than to mitigate it by requiring authentication and authorization on endpoints expecting YAML input.

criterions.comment: resteasy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
